results.title: Applications of Support Vector Machine (SVM) Learning in Cancer Genomics
results.summary: Implement a support vector machine (SVM) model to classify cancer subtypes using genomic data, as described in "Applications of Support Vector Machine (SVM) Learning in Cancer Genomics".

results.title: Application of support vector machine in cancer diagnosis
results.summary: Implement a Support Vector Machine (SVM) model for cancer diagnosis using tumor marker data, optimizing parameters via grid search and cross-validation, and evaluating performance using metrics like accuracy, sensitivity, and specificity.
